DOC.brief_summary: Relative bioavailability study compare inhalation Terbutaline Sulphate 1,5mg via current version Turbuhaler inhalation via new version
DOC.brief_title: Relative Bioavailability Study Compare Inhalation Terbutaline Sulphate 1,5mg Via Turbuhaler M3 With Turbuhaler M2
DOC.detailed_description: An Open-label , Single-dose , 2-period Cross Study Healthy Male Female Volunteers Assess Relative Bioavailability Terbutaline Sulphate 1.5 mg Inhalation via M3 Turbuhaler ( New Version ) Compared M2 Turbuhaler ( Current Version )
DOC.criteria: 1 . Female male volunteer age 18 65 year , inclusive 2 . Healthy judge Principal Investigator medical history , physical examination , 12lead ECG , laboratory test ( include HIV , HBsAg hepatitis C antibody test ) assessment pulse rate blood pressure 3 . Ability use Turbuhaler accord provided instruction , judge Principal Investigator study nurse 4 . Have body mass index ( BMI ) 18 30 kg/m2 inclusive weigh least 50 kg 100 kg 1 . History presence respiratory , gastrointestinal , hepatic renal disease condition know interfere absorption , distribution , metabolism excretion drug ( except cholecystectomy ) 2 . Current smoker smoke used nicotine product within previous 3 month exclude 3 . Plasma donation within 1 month screen blood donation blood loss 500 mL 3 month prior screen 4 . History severe allergy/hypersensitivity ongoing allergy/hypersensitivity , judge Principal Investigator history hypersensitivity terbutaline ( drug similar chemical structure class ) inhale lactose 5 . Positive screen drug abuse and/or alcohol and/or cotinine screening ( Visit 1 ) admission study centre ( Day 1 ) prior administration investigational medical product ( IMP ) Day 1
